Container.Name: fsarchiver
Container.Overview: fsarchiver CLI tool for backing up and restoring *.fsa files. [br][br]Passthrough physical/loop devices with the 'device' type. Mount loop devices with 'losetup /dev/loopXX /mnt/user/loopFile.img' in the host. Add a Path that contains or will contain the fsarchiver *.fsa backup files. 'nano' and 'screen' tools are included. [br][br]Privileges required for accessing the host devices. [br][br]Example commands in the Console: [br]- screen fsarchiver savefs /data/backup.fsa /dev/nvme1n1p1 /dev/nvme1n1p2 [br]- fsarchiver archinfo /data/backup.fsa [br]- screen fsarchiver restfs /data/backup.fsa id=0,dest=/dev/nvme1n1p1 id=1,dest=/dev/nvme1n1p2
